text: "Those Days" is the fourth track from Shaggy's album, Intoxication (2007). ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !align="left"|Chart (2004) !align="left"|Peak position |- |align="left"|Radio Eska Chart |align="center"|1 |- |- |} ==External links== * Category:Shaggy (musician) songs Category:2007 singles Category:2007 songs Category:Songs written by Shaggy (musician)
